charges.charge_disposition: It is the judgment of the crt dft is h/b comm to cust of BOP for term of 51 mos, ct 1, upon release from confinement, dft is placed on supervised release for period of 3 yrs upon terms and conditions (refer to J&;C entered 07/29/92) 1) comply w/rules and regulations of PO and gen ord 318 2) participate in a program as directed and approved by the PO for treatment of narcotic addiction or drug dependency which may include counseling or random testing to determine if the dft has reverted to the use of drugs 3) pay special assessment to US $50.00. Crt recommends dft be incarcerted in an institution in the State of Arizona. Purs to guidelines fines wvd, including costs of imprisonment and supv. Crt finds dft does not have ability to pay (1)

charges.charge_description: dft in viol of 18 usc 2113(a), Robbery of a Bank [2:92-m-3506]
